remarks: Derive axiom ~ ax-hvass from Hilbert space under ZF set theory. (Contributed by NM, 31-May-2008.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
axhil.1 $e |- U = <. <. +h , .h >. , normh >. $.
axhil.2 $e |- U e. CHilOLD $.
axhvass-zf $p |- ( ( A e. ~H /\ B e. ~H /\ C e. ~H ) -> ( ( A +h B ) +h C ) = ( A +h ( B +h C ) ) ) $.
